properties.name: account.lock.handler.enable
properties.description: Lock user accounts on failed login attempts

properties.name: account.lock.handler.On.Failure.Max.Attempts
properties.description: Number of failed login attempts allowed until account lock.

properties.name: account.lock.handler.Time
properties.description: Initial account lock time period in minutes. Account will be automatically unlocked after this time period.

properties.name: account.lock.handler.login.fail.timeout.ratio
properties.description: Account lock duration will be increased by this factor. Ex: Initial duration: 5m; Increment factor: 2; Next lock duration: 5 x 2 = 10m

properties.name: account.lock.handler.notification.manageInternally
properties.description: Disable if the client application handles notification sending

properties.name: account.lock.handler.notification.notifyOnLockIncrement
properties.displayName: Notify user when lock time is increased
properties.description: Notify user when the account lock duration is increased due to continuous failed login attempts.

properties.name: sso.login.recaptcha.enable.always
properties.description: Always prompt reCaptcha verification during SSO login flow.

properties.name: sso.login.recaptcha.enable
properties.displayName: Prompt reCaptcha after max failed attempts
properties.description: Prompt reCaptcha verification during SSO login flow only after the max failed attempts exceeded.

properties.name: sso.login.recaptcha.on.max.failed.attempts
properties.description: Number of failed attempts allowed without prompting reCaptcha verification.
